Reviews.Title: Sigh
Reviews.Author: damian rogers
Reviews.Content: the phone is good except on mine the return and menu buttons to the bottom dont work. i am having problems returning it

Reviews.Title: worst telephone ever
Reviews.Author: Nad
Reviews.Content: Worst telephone ever. I bought it for my dad, it used to work pretty well, after 35 days, it turned off by itself, It can't take any charge. I try to return, they don't let me too. It was a waste of money. Don't waste your money on that phone. Everytime after he receives a call, it turns off by itself. Please take my advice, don't buy this phone, please don't.

Reviews.Title: I used this in Europe
Reviews.Author: G. Miller
Reviews.Content: I bought this so we'd have mobile internet access while traveling in Europe.  I bought a SIM card and data service from an Orange store  in France, and then another in Switzerland.  (Every country has their own service.  No roaming on pay as you go plans.)  I set up a wifi hot-spot, for our PCs and tablets, and it worked great.  We even made a couple calls.  Dual SIMs were handy when going between countries (for switching service without having to remove/swap the SIM cards). I used Google translate on menus, and to communicate with various people.  It did it's job.Note:  It does not have a lot of memory/storage, so it filled with apps (and would take no more) fairly quickly.  Even with a large external micro SD card, this is true.  However I knew that going in, and it still met my needs, so it still get 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: Runs slow!!
Reviews.Author: Duane Mcnab
Reviews.Content: Phone runs way too slow and android systems is out of date. Cannot use apps like Facebook or Skype, only texting apps. The big apps take up all the phones ram capacity and causes it to freeze.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Carlos Toro
Reviews.Content: The product arrived at your destination without problems, totally recommend, excellent product, thank you very much. For anyone interested, you can purchase with confidence.

Reviews.Title: YES THIS ITEM SATISFICED MY EXPECTATION SO I AM NICE WITH IT
Reviews.Author: ABEL NIETO
Reviews.Content: I SHOOSED THIS ITEM BECAUSE OF ITS PRICE AND PERFORMANCEI LIKE IT BECAUSE IT WORKS VERY WELLI RECOMEND IT TO EVERY BODY WHO WANTS QUALITY PRODUCTS

Reviews.Title: MY ASSESSMENT  SAMSUNG GAL. Y DOUS S6102B
Reviews.Author: Sadiq Dan-Agboghayemeh
Reviews.Content: It is flexible, and above all, it satisfies all that I need in a phone. The only minus is the fast rate of battery discharge despite obeying cautionary instructions.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy Y DUOS S6102B Unlocked GSM Phone with  Dual SIM
Reviews.Author: Deon Segree
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for my neighbor and she loves it. I like the phone a lot but I think that it could be much bigger.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: Harold Anderson
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for an past girlfriend of mines,she wanted a Dual simm phone.But besides that its a great Smartphone not too big but can do alot. Gps and Emails and more. I like it very much so am going to buy one for myself next mth

Reviews.Title: i guess...
Reviews.Author: Karen
Reviews.Content: couldve spent money for something better... does this have 3G network?? I havent seen it.. but its gets me by for now

Reviews.Title: Good deal - recommended for international travel
Reviews.Author: Susan R Aadland
Reviews.Content: Really like the dual sim card option. I recommend this for international travel. Can use local in the country you are visiting. Still trying to figure out how to use an unlocked phone in our area of the US. (north central)

Reviews.Title: My son is using it in Israel.
Reviews.Author: Leon Wechsler "LW"
Reviews.Content: My son is using it in Israel.He called us several times, so it works.Only time will tell if it will be reliable !

Reviews.Title: My First Smart Phone
Reviews.Author: Dianne G. MacNair
Reviews.Content: I really like the phone but am having some problems with the new technology since it's my first 'smart phone'. I am not sure how long the battery is supposed to last but it seems to run down daily and I'm hardly using it. My other Samsung phone (A697 I think) has a battery life of at least five or six days. I don't know if I need a new battery or if my settings are off and draining it. I am feeling a little challenged at the moment but will overcome. For now I'm changing the SIM card back and forth between the phones until I learn what to expect from the battery and new phone. Can anyone point me in a direction where I can find some 'simple & practical' information? Thanks.

Reviews.Title: Keep looseing power
Reviews.Author: Carolyn Hickman
Reviews.Content: item cuts off and you have to recharge the battery every day, would not recommend anyone buy this phone.  screen goes black with out any reason.

Reviews.Title: perfect
Reviews.Author: biko
Reviews.Content: the phone is a good phone.it is  working good. has been in good shape. good  perfect and wonderful phone indeed.

Reviews.Title: no estoy contento ya que la publicidad muestra otro celular
Reviews.Author: Todo bien
Reviews.Content: I cheated is not 3GI'm not happy because advertising shows another cell says it's 3g is not so  ok

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: sistap
Reviews.Content: Seller is great phone came in excellent conditionEverything was as described bought this to useIn Jamaica as soon as I put the international simCard in phone works great

Reviews.Title: you don't always get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: Jayson Bailey
Reviews.Content: i reviewed this cell phone many times over and i liked what i saw however the phone i got was the 6102 instead of the 6102B although the phones are similar FGS Trading made an error in there processing department of this order  where i lived in the Caribbean it  works good and is compatible with the digicel network.

Reviews.Title: Fast shipping
Reviews.Author: Abdul Razak Salifu
Reviews.Content: I received this phone which was meant as a gift to my brother in africa,he received it and he like it alot.

Reviews.Title: i don't have coverage
Reviews.Author: burlesti
Reviews.Content: Since I bought this smart phone I have problems with coverage. Who wants to call me has to do it 3 times until my phone rings. I don't explain why. Except for that, software problems, the phone shows all the time that is charging even it is not plugged into the socket.  A lot of problems.

Reviews.Title: opalpc-gems
Reviews.Author: Fiery
Reviews.Content: The phone is excellent as a dual sim. Its also neat and has a lot of features that you would not normally get with a dual sim.  Thanks this should last me a while.

Reviews.Title: can not select ringtone form sd card
Reviews.Author: first buyer
Reviews.Content: Update 3:Just downloaded Samsung Kies with all the options I needed.Update 2:Still searching for software (pc studio) to download for windows 7.Update 1:Because I didn't receive a full description manual selecting an own ringtone was not that easy. After digging and trying I finally found the feature. I changed it from a one start to 4 star. Still looking to the functionalities.Previous reviewjust noticed that i can't select my own ringtone. I should read the helpfile...will check this. BUt the other options are find and cool. it is so that I select different ringtones for specific people so I know who is calling. This is for me very relevant.

Reviews.Title: yukky
Reviews.Author: rahul
Reviews.Content: Ordered 10 days back still no diliverd...Shippinc company calls me and inform that "YOUR MOBILE IS MISSING FROM PARCEL"Very baad aervice...

ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
GSM Quad-Band: 2G 850/900/1800/1900 MHz (Both SIMs) and 3G HSDPA 850/2100 plus GPRS/EDGE data capabilities.
Dual SIM Card Support with Dual SIM Stand-by; Android OS 2.3(Gingerbread); 3.14" TFT LCD Touchscreen with Samsung TouchWiz; Social Networking Integration; Wi-Fi with Wi-Fi Hotspot; GPS with A-GPS Support and Bluetooth v3.0 with A2DP.
HTML Browser with Adobe Flash; 832MHz Processor; Internal Memory 512 MB ROM, 384 MB RAM; MicroSD expandable up to 32GB; 3.5mm Audio Jack; MP3 and MP4 Player; SMS(threaded view), MMS, Email, Push Mail, IM, RSS; Accelerometer, Proximity and Compass Sensors.
Talk time up to 9 hours - Standby up to 360 hrs.
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung Galaxy Y DUOS S6102B Unlocked GSM Phone with Dual SIM, Android 2.3 OS, 3MP Camera, Wi-Fi, GPS and microSD Slot - Strong Black
